menu.mainMenu:
Welcome to the Bibi Config Menu.

:one: Disable Config

:two: Enable Config

:three: Reset Prefix

:four: Set Channel

:five: Set Language

:six: Set Message

:seven: Set Prefix

:eight: Set Welcome Card
menu.disableConfigPage:
Tell me what do you want to disable

:one: All

:two: Welcome Card

:three: Welcome Message

:four: Leave Message

:five: Modlogs
menu.enableConfigPage:
Tell me what do you want to enable

:one: All

:two: Welcome Card

:three: Welcome Message

:four: Leave Message

:five: Modlogs
menu.setChannelPage:
Tell me which channel you want to set

:one: Modlogs

:two: Welcome Channel

:three: Leave Channel

:four: Level Notification Channel
menu.setLanguagePage:
Tell me which language you want to set

:one: English

:two: Spanish

:three: Portuguese
menu.setMessagePage:
Tell me which message you want to set

:one: Welcome Message

:two: Leave Message
menu.setPrefixPage:
Select the type of prefix you want

:one: Without space (eg: `bbhelp`)

:two: With space (eg: `bb help`)
menu.setWelcomeCardPage:
Select the welcome card you want

:one: Purple

:two: Red

:three: Black

:four: White

about.description:
Bibi is a very simple, multi-purpose social Brawl Stars bot with many features and commands that are always being improved and updated!

Saber#1875 created Bibi to fill the need of a versatile social Brawl Stars discord bot. Bibi has always been crafted with the user in mind, which is why there is a big emphasis on design. We sincerely hope you enjoy this bot, and if so, please share it and vote for it!

discord.description: **[Click here](https://discord.gg/nCh7AwG)** to join our support server!

invite.description: **[Click here](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=713181335623041076&permissions=388166&scope=bot)** to add the bot to your own server!
